name: Notify users in case of emergency
Heading and some CSS for Flow
Time elapsed
Get Elapsed Hr
motor-control
format:
<head>

<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Satisfy&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Cinzel:wght@800&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Pacifico&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

<style>
:root {
    --dist_change: 40px;
}
/* icon */
.nr-dashboard-button i {
    vertical-align: unset;
    width: unset;
}

.motor-control button {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;

    background-color: #F8F8FF !important;
    border-radius: 20px;    
    border: 1.1px solid grey;   
    
    scale: 0.7;
    font-size: 180px;
    opacity: 1;

    text-shadow: 2px 2px grey;
    color: black !important;
    box-shadow: 0 4px black,
                0 12px grey !important; 

    transition-duration: 0.4s;
    visibility: visible;
}
.motor-control button:hover {
    transition-duration: 0.2s;
    text-shadow: none;
    border: none;

    background: rgb(156,186,255);
    background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(156,186,255,1) 24%, 
                rgba(208,246,255,1) 53%, 
                rgba(211,255,239,1) 75%,
                rgba(226,255,206,1) 100%);
/*
    transition-duration: 0.2s;
    text-shadow: none;
    border: 0.9px solid #4682B4;
    box-shadow: none !important; 
    box-shadow: 0 1px #4682B4 !important; 
    
    background: rgb(2,0,36);
    background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(2,0,36,1) 0%
    , rgba(9,9,121,1) 35%
    , rgba(0,212,255,1) 100%);
*/
}
.motor-control button:active {
    transform: translateY(8px);
    box-shadow: 0 4px black !important;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px #ffc9da;
    color: #fe7ca5 !important;
    transition-duration: 0.4s;
/*
    background: rgb(136,136,255);
    background: linear-gradient(104deg, rgba(136,136,255,1) 22%
        , rgba(102,143,247,1) 44%
        , rgba(13,182,247,1) 66%
        , rgba(13,219,180,1) 100%);
*/
/*    transition-duration: 0.2s;
    text-shadow: none;

    background: linear-gradient(45deg, rgba(2,0,36,1) 0%
    , rgba(9,9,121,1) 35%
    , rgba(0,212,255,1) 100%);
    -webkit-background-clip: text;
    -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
*/
}


.ahead button {
    top: var(--dist_change);
}

.right button {
    right: var(--dist_change);
}


.back button { 
    bottom: var(--dist_change);
}

.left button {
    left: var(--dist_change);
}

.mode_title {
    font-size: 40px;
    font-weight: 800;

    /*background-color: white !important;
    border-radius: 20px;
    border: 1.1px solid grey;
    */
    text-shadow: 0 1px #808d93,
                -1px 0 #cdd2d5,
                -1px 2px #808d93,
                -2px 1px #cdd2d5;
    
    /*box-shadow: 0 1px black,
                0 2px grey !important;
    */
    letter-spacing: 2px;
    text-align: left;
    font-family: 'Satisfy', cursive;
}
.mode_auto_title {
    transform: translateY(-28px);
    color: #4255f7 !important;
}
.mode_manual_title {
    color: #e79800 !important;
}
.mode_stop_title {
    transform: translateY(28px);
    color: #ce0020 !important;
}

.car_control_tag {
    font-size: 40px;
    font-weight: 800;
    transform: translateY(20px);
    text-shadow: 0 1px #808d93,
                -1px 0 #cdd2d5,
                -1px 2px #808d93,
                -2px 1px #cdd2d5;
    
    letter-spacing: 2px;
    text-align: center;
    vertical-align: center;
    font-family: 'Cinzel', serif;
}
.mode_switching_tag {
    color: #EEE8AA !important;
}
.direction_tag {
    color: #ffb97b !important;
}
.speed_tag {
    color: #ff7e4e !important;
}

.keyboard_tag {
    font-size: 28px;
    /*font-weight: 200;
    */transform: translateY(-10px);
    text-shadow: 0 1px #808d93,
                -1px 0 #cdd2d5,
                -1px 2px #808d93,
                -2px 1px #cdd2d5;
    color: #ffdfb5 !important;
    letter-spacing: 2px;
    text-align: center;
    vertical-align: center;
    font-family: 'Pacifico', cursive;
}
.keyboard_tag button {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    background-color: #F8F8FF !important;
    border-radius: 10px;
    border: 1.05px solid grey;
    color: #3e3535 !important;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px grey;
    box-shadow: 0 1px black,
                0 2px grey !important;

    /* Reference: https://linuxhint.com/disable-click-event-using-css/#:~:text=html,as%20%E2%80%9Cnone%E2%80%9D%3A */
    /* Làm cho button ko click được */
    pointer-events: none;

    visibility: visible;
}
</style>
</head>

name: Temperature And Humidity CSS
format:
<head>
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Lobster+Two:ital,wght@0,400;1,400;1,700&display=swap"
    rel="stylesheet">

<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Pacifico&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

<style>

.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-gauge-titlel {
    font-size: 28px;
    font-weight: 800;
    z-index: 1;
}

.temp_humid_gauge_title {
    
    text-shadow: 0 1px #808d93,
                -1px 0 #cdd2d5,
                -1px 2px #808d93,
                -2px 1px #cdd2d5;
    letter-spacing: 2px;

    transform: translateY(20px);
    text-align: center;

    font-family: 'Lobster Two', cursive;
}

.humid_title {
    color: #1D4DBC !important;
}

.temp_title {
    color: #e57069 !important;
}

.heatindex_title {
    color: #FF9A54 !important;
}

.nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-chart-titlel {
    font-size: 40px;
    font-weight: 500;
}

.temp_humid_chart_title {

    transform: translateY(5px);
    text-align: center;
    font-family: 'Pacifico', cursive;
    text-shadow: 0 1px #808d93,
    -1px 0 #cdd2d5,
    -1px 2px #808d93,
    -2px 1px #cdd2d5;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
    color: #ffffbb !important;
}

<\style>
<\head>

name: Gas Concentration CSS
format:
<head>
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
<link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Almendra+SC&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Playfair+Display+SC:ital,wght@1,900&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

<style>

.gas_gauge_title {
    text-shadow: 0 1px #808d93,
                -1px 0 #cdd2d5,
                -1px 2px #808d93,
                -2px 1px #cdd2d5;
    letter-spacing: 2px;
    transform: translateY(5px);
    text-align: center;
    font-family: 'Almendra SC', serif;
}

.lpg_title {
    color: #ff5b71 !important;
}

.co_title {
    color: #5556e8 !important;
}

.smoke_title {
    color: #61ffc6 !important;
}

.gas_chart_title {
    transform: translateY(15px);
    text-align: center;
    font-family: 'Playfair Display SC', serif;
    text-shadow: 0 1px #808d93,
                -1px 0 #cdd2d5,
                -1px 2px #808d93,
                -2px 1px #cdd2d5;
    letter-spacing: 1px;
    color: #ffffbb !important;
}

<\style>
<\head>

name: Speed Controller
format: 1×

name: Mode Switching CSS
Detect Keypress
format:
<script>
    (function($scope) {
    document.onkeydown = function (e) {
        let msg = {"payload": e.key.toLowerCase(),  "topic": "keydown"};
        $scope.send(msg);
    };
    
    document.onkeyup = function (e) {
        let msg = {"payload": e.key.toLowerCase(), "topic": "keyup"};
        $scope.send(msg);
    };
})(scope);
</script>

name: keyup -> nhận 1 lần, keydown -> nhận nhiều lần
CSS for text
format:
<head>
  <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Audiowide|Sofia|Trirong">
  <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com">
  <link rel="preconnect" href="https://fonts.gstatic.com" crossorigin>
  <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Nabla&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
  
<style>

.title {
  font-size: 80px;
  font-weight: 800;
  z-index: 1;
  letter-spacing: 2px;
  /*border-left: 6px solid blue;
  */text-align: center;
  font-family: 'Nabla', cursive;
}
.shadow10 {
  color: yellow !important;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.7),
              5px 5px 1px orange,
              6px 6px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.7),
              10px 10px 1px red,
              11px 11px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.7),
              15px 15px 1px purple,
              16px 16px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.7);
  -webkit-animation: text-snake 1s infinite alternate;
  -moz-animation: text-snake 1s infinite alternate;
  -ms-animation: text-snake 1s infinite alternate;
  animation: text-snake 1s infinite alternate;
}

/* other prefixed animation blocks ommitted for brevity */
@keyframes text-snake {
  from {
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.7),
                5px 5px 1px orange,
                6px 6px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.7),
                10px 10px 1px red,
                11px 11px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.7),
                15px 15px 1px purple,
                16px 16px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.7);
  }
  to {
  text-shadow: -1px 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.7),
              -5px 5px 1px orange,
              -6px 6px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.7),
              -10px 10px 1px red,
              -11px 11px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.7),
              -15px 15px 1px purple,
              -16px 16px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.7);
  }
}
.save button:hover {
  background-color: green !important; 
  color: black !important;
}
.save button  {
  border: none;
  border-radius: 8px;
  text-align: center;
  width: 50% ;
  transition-duration: 0.4s;
  background-color: #ddffdd;
  color: white;         
}

.time_title {
  font-size: 22px;
  text-align: center;
  font-weight: bold;
  font-family: georgia, serif;
  color: #FCF5CA !important;
  text-shadow: 0.6px 0.6px 1.2px #C1ECE4,
               1.2px 1.2px 2.4px #0D7377;
}

</style>
</head>

name: CSS-Basics-For-Dashboard
format:
<head>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Audiowide|Sofia|Trirong">
    <link href='https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Allerta Stencil' rel='stylesheet'>
    
<style>
    root,
    a,
    button,
    p,
    div {
        -webkit-user-select: none !important;
    }

    body {
/*      background-image: url("/image/background.jpg");
        background: linear-gradient(120deg, rgba(40, 42, 49, 1.0) 40%, rgba(47, 49, 56, 1.0) 80%) !important;
        background-size: cover !important;
*/        background: transparent !important;

        background: -webkit-linear-gradient(55deg,
                #009785 0%,
                #245aa5 100%) !important;

        -webkit-touch-callout: none !important;
        color: #ffffff !important;
        padding-top: 5px !important;
    }
    h1 {color:transparent;}
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar,
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
        background-color: transparent !important;
        color: #FFFFFF;
    }

    ui-card-panel {
        background-color: rgba(250, 250, 250, 0.3) !important;
        border: none !important;
        border-radius: 10px !important;
        font-size: 24px;
        font-family: "Audiowide", sans-serif;
    }

    ui-card-panel>div.nr-dashboard-cardpanel>div>md-card {
        background: none !important;
    }

    ui-card-panel>div.nr-dashboard-cardpanel button {
    }

    md-toolbar {
        background: none !important;
    }

    md-sidenav {
        background: linear-gradient(120deg, rgba(40, 42, 49, 0.90) 20%, rgba(47, 49, 56, 0.90) 80%) !important;
    }

    .md-button {
        border-radius: 10px;
        /*
        display: none !important;
        visibility: hidden;
        */
        visibility: hidden;
    }
    
</style>

</head>

name: Dashboard style
format:
<style>
    ui-card-panel {
        box-shadow: rgba(0,0,0,0.35) 0px 5px 15px;
        border-radius: 5px;
    }

    ui-card-panel * {
        border-radius: 2.5px;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
        text-align: center;
        font-weight: bold;
        text-transform: uppercase;

        text-shadow: 0.8px 0.8px 2px #F4EEFF, 
                     2px 2px 4px #865DFF;
        color: #d3eaf2 !important;
    }
    .nr-dashboard-cardtitle:hover {
    }
</style>

name: Heading Title
format: NaVi-001

name: Navigation And Download CSS
format:
<head>
<style>
    :root {
        --border_rad: 12px;
        --pad_value: 5px;
    }

    .navigation-title {
        transform: translateY(20px);
        text-align: center;
        font-family: 'Allerta Stencil';
        font-size: 30px;
        color: #E8F6EF !important;
        text-shadow: -1px 0 #8294C4, 0 -1px #ACB1D6,
                    0 1px #8294C4, 1px 0 #ACB1D6;
    }

    .navigation-button button {
        width: 100%;
        scale: 0.9;
        top: 12px;
        /*
        transform: scaleY(2);
        */
        text-align: center;
        text-decoration: none;
        border: 2px solid #008000 !important;
        border-radius: 50%;
        transition-duration: 0.4s;
        
        font-family: 'Allerta Stencil';
        font-size: 60px;

        background-color: none !important;
        background-color: rgba(50,205,50,0.7) !important;
        color: #E8F6EF !important;
        text-shadow: -1px 0 #8294C4, 0 -1px #ACB1D6,
                      0 1px #8294C4, 1px 0 #ACB1D6;

        box-shadow: 0 10px #8c8c8c !important;

        visibility: visible;
    }
    .navigation-button button:active {
        transform: translateY(5px);
        box-shadow: 0 5px #666 !important;
        transition-duration: 0.4s;
    }

    .home-button button {
        left: 22px;
    }
    .home-button button:hover {
        transition-duration: 0.2s;
        background-color: #008000 !important;
        border: 2px solid #008000 !important;
    }

    .logout-button button {
        left: 24px;
        border: 2px solid #CD1818 !important;
        background-color: rgba(250, 95, 85,0.85) !important;
    }
    .logout-button button:hover {
        transition-duration: 0.2s;
        background-color: #CD1818 !important;
        border: 2px solid #CD1818 !important;
    }

    .save-button button {
        border: 2px solid #2E2EFF !important;
        background-color: #2c55ffe6 !important;
    }
    .save-button button:hover {
        transition-duration: 0.2s;
        background-color: #2E2EFF !important;
        border: 2px solid #2E2EFF !important;
    }


<\style>
<\head>

name: Set audio out
Add Topic
Light CSS
format:
<head>
<style>
    :root {
        --border_rad: 12px;
        --pad_value: 5px;
    }

    .light-button button {
        width: 100%;
        scale: 0.9;
        bottom: 12px;
        
        text-align: center;
        text-decoration: none;
        border: 2px solid #008000 !important;
        border-radius: var(--border_rad);
        transition-duration: 0.4s;
        
        font-family: 'Allerta Stencil';
        font-size: 24px;

        background-color: none !important;
        background-color: rgba(50,205,50,0.7) !important;
        color: #E8F6EF !important;
        text-shadow: -1px 0 #8294C4, 0 -1px #ACB1D6,
                      0 1px #8294C4, 1px 0 #ACB1D6;

        box-shadow: 0 10px #8c8c8c !important;
    }
    .light-button button:active {
        transform: translateY(5px);
        box-shadow: 0 5px #666 !important;
        transition-duration: 0.4s;
    }

    .on-button {
    }
    .on-button button:hover {
        transition-duration: 0.2s;
        background-color: #008000 !important;
        border: 2px solid #008000 !important;
    }

    .off-button button {
        border: 2px solid #CD1818 !important;
        background-color: rgba(250, 95, 85,0.85) !important;
    
    }
    .off-button button:hover {
        transition-duration: 0.2s;
        background-color: #CD1818 !important;
        border: 2px solid #CD1818 !important;
    }

    .auto-button button {
        border: 2px solid #2E2EFF !important;
        background-color: rgba(65, 105, 225, 0.9) !important;
    }
    .auto-button button:hover {
        transition-duration: 0.2s;
        background-color: #2E2EFF !important;
        border: 2px solid #2E2EFF !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-ui_multistate_switch {
    }
    .multistate-switch-wrapper.multistate-switch-round {
        background-color: rgba(255, 250, 240, 0.1) !important;
        border-radius: 1em;
        border: 0.9px solid rgba(232, 232, 232, 0.5);
        opacity: 0.9;
        bottom: 8px;
        height: 28px;
        width: 100%;
        scale: 1.04;
        display: flex;
        position: relative;
        flex-flow: column nowrap;
        justify-content: center;
        align-items: center;
        box-shadow: 0 1px #B9D3EE,
                    0 2px #C6E2FF !important;
    }
    .multistate-switch-slider.multistate-switch-round {
        display: flex;
        width: 95px;
        height: 100%;
        align-items: center;

        transform: translate(0.15em,-0.1em);
        padding: 0;
    }

<\style>
<\head>
